summary: A collection of utilities for preparing audio data for automatic speech recognition, covering loading of pre‑computed acoustic features, conversion of raw waveforms into mel‑scale filter‑bank representations, extensive audio augmentations (gain, noise, reverberation, speed, etc.), and flexible handling of audio segments including slicing, padding, and saving.
business_intent: Enable robust ASR model training and inference by providing standardized pipelines for feature loading, extraction, augmentation, and segment manipulation, thereby improving data diversity and preprocessing efficiency.
